main

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Dan Crosby & Leanne Kendrick This Main class will be the class that controls program flow for Billy Bob's Farm. This class will also contain some global variables and initializers to help setup properties for the objects. Objects that will be manipulated by the main class include: --Farm class - An instance of farm will be associated with a player and players can purchase plants. --Plant class - An instance of a class can be associated with a farm during game play. --Watermelon, Corn, Carrot, Potato and Tomato classes are all classes that extend Plant with custom -- properties, and when the game play proceeds different disasters can affect different types of plants.

      Round a number to the provided precision
      static void startGame()
      Play the game: Loop through each round Loop through each player within each round Player moves to the next round by typing "no changes" If the player types Quit (and then ProcessGameRound returns false), then the game should end.

      • startGame

        public static void startGame()
        Play the game: Loop through each round Loop through each player within each round Player moves to the next round by typing "no changes" If the player types Quit (and then ProcessGameRound returns false), then the game should end.

      • processGameRound

        public static boolean processGameRound()
        Loops through each player and gathers input for commands that can be processed by each player in each round.
        Parameters:
        int - round The number of the round being processed
        Returns:
        boolean (If false then the round failed)

        A simple function to prompt and catch an enter key to manage the flow of user input.
        Parameters:
